name: Bad Donut - Baker City
description:
Bad Donut is an action game with upgrades and achievements. You bake Donuts, enemy bakes Ponchkis. As teams bake they gain resources to fight each other. Time works against You - You have to constantly collect clocks to keep the game running.


If you're injoy this game and would like to see more maps, weapons and game types just share it, leave a comment or support it.

Thank you,
MDG

Check out for news at Twitter @baddonutgame
